const dayToCountDown = Date.parse("August 30, 2023"); const [days, hours, minutes, seconds] = useCountdown(dayToCountDown); const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const changeIndex = useCallback(() => { if (index !== 7) setIndex(index + 1); else setIndex(0); }, [index]); useEffect(() => { const intervalId = setInterval(changeIndex, 5000); return () => { clearInterval(intervalId); }; }, [changeIndex]); return (
